CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, February 9, 1963, pg. 22, reads: "Diamond Talk - Dick Stuart, traded by the Pirates to the Boston Red Sox, draws a big laugh from pitcher Earl Francis and second baseman Bill Mazeroski as they discuss baseball at teh Dapper Dan banquet held at the Hilton Hotel on Sunday night. All three were honored guests at the affair. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Pittsburgh Pirates baseball players Dick Stuart, Earl Francis, and Bill Mazeroski, standing in Hilton Hotel during Dapper Dan banquet
